en: Escoria in Daïza was created by Élisa de Castro Guerra, Cédric Gémy, Camille "nylnook" Bissuel, Gaëtan "Reptifur" Hilt and Adrien "Kooda" Ramos in Rennes for the « Creating Point and Click Games with Escoria » booksprint from August 22 to 26 in Rennes, France
